animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm known for eating peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I meow and purr, and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.
🐈 I am a common household pet.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. I love to play fetch! Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a loyal companion.
🎾 I often play fetch in the park.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.
🌍 I'm found in grasslands of Africa.

animal.question: I'm a reptile with a hard shell. I move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🏠 My shell is like a house that I carry on my back.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to mimic people.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I peel my bananas before eating them.

animal.question: I have a pouch and hop around in Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I can jump very high.
🇦🇺 I am native to Australia.
🌱 I eat grass and leaves and carry my babies in my pouch.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color to blend in with my surroundings.
🌊 I squirt ink to get away from danger.
💙 I am an invertebrate with a soft body.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal bird known for my wise reputation and can turn my head almost all the way around. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I have excellent night vision.
🐭 I hunt small animals, especially mice.
🌙 I am active at night and sleep during the day.

animal.question: I build dams and have large front teeth. I am known for being a busy builder. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I gnaw on trees to build my home.
🇨🇦 I am the national animal of Canada.
🏠 I create ponds and wetlands by building dams.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm often seen in winter.
🥶 You can make a snowman out of me.
🌨️ I'm made of frozen water.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give warmth and light.
😎 Plants need me to grow.
👆 Look up to see me during the day.

weather.question: I have no voice, but I can roar. I can be gentle or strong. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can blow leaves off trees.
🍃 I can fill the sails of a boat.
🌬️ Sometimes I'm a gentle breeze, sometimes I'm a hurricane.

weather.question: I fall from the sky but I'm not snow. I make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💧 Plants and animals need me to survive.
🌧️ Puddles form when there's lots of me.

weather.question: I'm white and puffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain.

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy sheep.
🌥️ I can block the sun.
🌧️ Dark ones often mean a storm is coming.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, appearing after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ You need both rain and sunshine to see me.
✨ I'm often said to have a pot of gold at the end.

weather.question: I am water vapor that turns to ice on cold surfaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I look like tiny crystals.
🚗 You might find me on your car windshield in the morning.
❄️ I'm similar to snow, but form directly on objects.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm with high winds. I form over warm ocean waters.

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌊 People often evacuate when I am approaching land.

weather.question: I am a sudden electrical discharge in the sky. I come with a loud crash of thunder.

hints.text: ⚡ I light up the sky.
⛈️ I am often part of a thunderstorm.
🌩️ You should seek shelter when I am around.

weather.question: I am a funnel-shaped cloud that touches the ground, spinning with powerful winds.

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift cars and houses.
💨 I am also called a twister.
🚨 Taking shelter underground is the safest place to be when I appear.
